catalog_info.title: Linear Algebra and Applications
catalog_info.prereq: Anti-Req: Not to be taken in addition to Mathematics 23a or 25a or 55a.
catalog_info.description: Real and complex vector spaces, linear transformations, determinants, inner products, dual spaces, and eigenvalue problems. Applications to geometry, systems of linear differential equations, electric circuits, optimization, and Markov processes. Emphasizes learning to understand and write proofs. Students will work in small groups to solve problems and develop proofs.
